column4: I meant that since I upgraded to jaunty from hardy I have no sound. Im using a Dell inspiron 1545 which has a Intel Corporation 82801I (ICH9 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
oops, i got disconnected. did anyone reply while I was disconnected?
take a look at this link: http://www.ubuntugeek.com/sound-solutions-for-ubuntu-904-jaunty-users.html
thanks very much. Have you had similar trouble?
